summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the EsmFold model’s configuration, initialization, forward computation, attention mechanisms, head pruning, embedding resizing, gradient handling, multi‑GPU execution, serialization, and TorchScript conversion, ensuring the model behaves correctly across diverse scenarios.
business_intent: Provide confidence in the correctness and robustness of the EsmFold protein‑folding model for research and production use, reducing risk of errors when deploying the model in scientific or commercial pipelines.
